triples.name: Object detection
triples.relevance: The paper proposes methods to improve object detection in DETR-based detectors.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: DETR uses transformer architecture as its foundation for end-to-end object detection.

triples.name: Attention (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper addresses attention learning in decoder components of transformer-based detectors.

triples.name: Convolutional neural network
triples.relevance: CNN architectures are used as backbones in the DETR variants being improved.

triples.name: Region Based Convolutional Neural Networks
triples.relevance: Faster R-CNN is a region-based CNN approach whose label assignment strategy (one-to-many) is leveraged in Co-DETR.

triples.name: Vision transformer
triples.relevance: ViT-L backbone is used in Co-DETR to achieve state-of-the-art results on COCO and LVIS.

triples.name: List of datasets in computer vision and image processing
triples.relevance: COCO dataset is used for training and evaluating the object detection models.

triples.name: Feature extraction
triples.relevance: The encoder learns discriminative features from input images in the DETR architecture.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The entire approach is built on deep learning techniques for end-to-end object detection.

triples.name: Multi-label classification
triples.relevance: Co-DETR proposes a novel hybrid assignments training scheme leveraging both one-to-one and one-to-many label assignments.
